snippet: For competitors who have trained vigorously, luck plays a surprisingly large role when it comes time to ride a horse they have just met.
abstract: Luck plays a surprisingly large role for modern pentathlon Olympians when it comes time to ride a horse they have just met; riders have a critical 20 minutes to get to know their horses before competing.

byline.original: By CAMPBELL ROBERTSON and SARAH LYALL

lead_paragraph: For competitors who have trained vigorously, luck plays a surprisingly large role when it comes time to ride a horse they have just met.

headline.seo: In Olympic Pentathlon, Riding Horses They’ve Only Just Met
headline.main: For Pentathletes, All Business on the First Date
headline.print_headline: All Business on the First Date
